dcterms:description: S3DIS contains 3D point clouds of 6 areas, totally 272 rooms. Each point in the scan is annotated with one of the semantic labels from 13 categories (chair, table, floor, wall etc. plus clutter).
dcterms:title: S3DIS

dcterms:description: ScanNet contains 1513 3D indoor scene scans, split into 1201 for training and 312 for testing. There are 21 classes in total and 20 classes are used for evaluation while 1 class for free space.
dcterms:title: ScanNet

dcterms:description: ModelNet40 contains 12311 3D meshed models from 40 categories, with 9843 for training and 2468 for testing.
dcterms:title: ModelNet40
